snippet.title: Keep in Mind: Remastered | Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉  https://bit.ly/33QMo4D

If you awoke in a dark world plagued by beasts and demons, what would you do? Keep in Mind: Remastered follows Jonas, a man haunted by alcoholism, depression, and grief. One night, he awakens to a shadowy mirror world where beasts lurk and the stars don't shine. Lost and scared, Jonas must face all those twisted beasts if he ever wishes to return home and learn the truth about his darkness.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
